Commands in depth
=================

This section describes each Toolbox command in greater detail. They are listed, more or less, in the order they ought to be executed when wanting to do your analysis.

set
---

get
---

catalog
-------

read
----

browse
------

download
--------

ngrams
------

concordance
-----------

grammars
--------

cluster
-------

tm
--

datasette
---------

play
----
